attributes.additional_details: Driving tests and driving lesson were allowed in the last long down so I can’t understand why it can’t be done now the back log for driving tests is gonna be horrendous the driving instructors stick to all the COVID restrictions with cleaning the car before every pupil to a high standard hand sanitiser they hands to always wearing a mask same as the pupil so could we get it changed to restart  tests and driving lessons !!
attributes.background: Restart driving lessons and tests for the NHS and carers and also carers who cared for family members too

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Exempt driving tests and lessons from COVID-19 restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462

Allow driving tests and lessons for Keyworkers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566844
